subtitle: These spicy kebabs are very easy to make. Serve with rice or crisp lettuce.

method.text: Thread the pork and courgette chunks alternately onto 12 skewers.

For the satay sauce, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the onion, garlic and chilli powder until the onion has softened. Allow to cool slightly then place in a food processor with the remaining ingredients and whizz until smooth adding a little water if necessary to give the right consistency.
Brush the kebabs with the sauce and place on the barbecue or under a preheated grill and for about 15 min, turning frequently and basting with the sauce until evenly cooked.
Serve immediately with salad and the remainder of the sauce served separately in a small bowl, garnished with freshly chopped coriander.

title: Pork satay kebabs
